edu.rice.starvote

Class ExternalProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rice.starvote.ExternalProcess

  • public final class ExternalProcess
extends java.lang.Object

    Utility methods to spawn external processes and capture their output.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExternalProcess()

    • Method Detail

      • runOnly

        public static void runOnly(java.lang.String... args)
                    throws java.io.IOException

        Spawn the specified child process without capturing its output. The child process inherits the working directory of the current Java process. Does not wait for the child process to complete.

        Example

        runOnly("rm", "-rf", "/home/*")

        Parameters:
        args - Command line to execute, comma-separated by arguments.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs starting the process.

      • runInDir

        public static void runInDir(java.io.File wd,
                            java.lang.String... args)
                     throws java.io.IOException

        Spawn the specified child process without capturing its output, using the specified working directory. Does not wait for the child process to complete.

        Example

        runInDir(new File("/home/bin"), "touch", "touched.txt")

        Parameters:
        wd - Working directory of child process.
        args - Command line to execute, comma-separated by arguments.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs starting the process.

      • runInDirAndCapture

        public static java.lang.String runInDirAndCapture(java.io.File wd,
                                                  java.lang.String... args)
                                           throws java.io.IOException

        Spawn the specified child process and capture its standard output and standard error, using the specified working directory. Blocks until child process is complete.

        Example

        String result = runInDirAndCapture(new File("/dev"), "ls", "-l")

        Parameters:
        wd - Working directory of child process.
        args - Command line to execute, comma-separated by arguments.
        Returns:
        All standard output and error generated by child process.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs starting the process or reading its output.

      • runAndCapture

        public static java.lang.String runAndCapture(java.lang.String... args)
                                      throws java.io.IOException

        Spawn the specified child process and capture its standard output and standard error. The child process inherits the working directory of the current Java process. Blocks until child process is complete.

        Example

        String result = runAndCapture("ls", "-l")

        Parameters:
        args - Command line to execute, comma-separated by arguments.
        Returns:
        All standard output and error generated by child process.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs starting the process or reading its output.
